FuncDef:
The inside-pool command creates a private network address pool for static source tracing configuration.
The undo inside-pool command deletes the created private network address pool.
By default, no private network address pool exists in the static source tracing algorithm view.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of the private network address pool for static source tracing.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 2000.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The static source tracing algorithm parameters include the private network address pool, public network address pool, port range, and port size. A private network address pool can consist of multiple private network address segments. To create a private network address pool or enter the private network address pool view, run the inside-pool command. To configure a private network address segment, run the section command.
Precautions
If static source tracing algorithm parameters have been configured in the static source tracing algorithm view, a bound private network address pool cannot be deleted, or no address segments can be added to the private network address pool view.
